vsph.webClient.registerPage.formDescription: Create an account in application using the form below.

errors.minlength: Username must have at least 3 characters.
errors.pattern: Username can including only small letters, digits and followind characters: '-' and '_'.

errors.exist: Account with following email account already exist.

password.info: Password must have at least 8 characters, one big and small letter, one digit and one special character.

errors.pattern: Password must have at least 8 characters, one big and small letter, one digit and one special character.

errors.mismatch: Confirmed password and provided password must be the same.

errors.notAll: Birth date must be filled with month, day and year.
errors.inappropriateAge: It is required to be at least 13 years old to create an account.

errors.minlength: First name must have at least 2 characters.
Last name must have at least 2 characters.

secondEmailAddress.info: Provided second email address is only for account recovery.

errors.exact: Second email address must be different than primary email address.

allowNotifs.value: I want to send email notifications about new updates, changes and special offers. You can decline at any time.

errors.required: You need to agree to our terms of service to continue.

enabledMfa.value: I want to enable multi factor authentication. You can decline at any time.

vsph.webClient.resetPasswordPage.formDescription: In case reset password, pass your username or email address. On the mailbox associated with the account, expect further instructions.

errors.required: Username or email address is required.
errors.pattern: Username or email address contains illegal characters.

vsph.webClient.resetPasswordPage.successfullSendEmailMessage: If account with provided login exist, we send verification email on your mailbox.

vsph.webClient.changePasswordPage.formDescription: In case set new password, pass your new password and password confirmation data.

errors.pattern: New password must have at least 8 characters, one big and small letter, one digit and one special character.

errors.mismatch: Confirmed new password and new password must be the same.

vsph.webClient.changePasswordPage.successfullySetNewPassword: Your old password was successfully changed to new one. From this moment, you can log into your account with new credentials.

vsph.webClient.activateAccountPage.formDescription: To activate your account, enter the token your received the email int the field below. An unactivated account will be deleted after 48 hours.
vsph.webClient.activateAccountPage.successfullyActivatedMessage: Your account was successfully activated. Now, you can log in your account using the button link below.

vsph.webClient.snackbar.declineCaptchaResetPassword: To reset your password, you need to fill in the Captcha field.

vsph.webClient.modal.captchaResetPassword: Before sending an email message to reset your password, fill in the captcha field below to prove you are not a robot.
vsph.webClient.modal.captchaSignup: Before create an application account, fill in the captcha field below to prove you are not a robot.
vsph.webClient.modal.captchaResendEmailMessage: Before re-sending an email message, fill in the captcha field below to prove you are not a robot.
